inputs.sentence: It takes great courage to see the world in all its tainted glory, and still to love it. -Oscar Wilde

inputs.sentence: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor. -Eleanor Roosevelt

sentence: If life were opportune it would cease to be life, and be without relish. -Ariel Roosevelt
